Navatar is a video social platform for virtual identities.

In this trial version you can select an animated free avatar to do Google meet for you. 

You can use it for video call, virtual party, or use it to provide customer support or sales service without disclosing your real identity.

Navatar captures usersâ€™ real time facial expression to animate the avatars.

For more details: https://navatar.live

Enjoy!


Next version:
- add hand gestures
- support 1:1 PFP unique animated avatars
- enhance facial expression accuracy

Recent upgrade:
v1.1: user away indication on avatar, iris movement fix


Data collection:
We do NOT collect your facial image and store it in our server. The whole navatar application is edge based and will NOT send anything to our server. If some data needed to be collected to perform certain functions in future versions, we will ask for permission within the navatar application.
